For information about Medicare prescription drug coverage, visit http://www.medicare.gov to get a free copy of ""Your Guide to Medicare Prescription Drug Coverage."" (Under ""Search Tools,"" select ""Find a Medicare Publication."") If you have questions about Medicaid, you can call your State Medical Assistance (Medicaid) office for more information. V
